contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement <!-- See Template:Infobox settlement for additional fields and descriptions --> | name = Yenipazar | image_skyline = | image_caption = | image_shield = | pushpin_map = Turkey | latd = 40 |latm = 10 |lats = 12 |latNS = N | longd = 30 |longm = 31 |longs = 12 |longEW = E | coordinates_display = inline,title | coordinates_format = dms | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = [[Turkey]] | subdivision_type1 = [[Provinces of Turkey|Province]] | subdivision_name1 = [[Bilecik Province|Bilecik]] | subdivision_type2 = | subdivision_name2 = | leader_party = | leader_title = <!-- Mayor --> | leader_name = | leader_title1 = <!-- [[Kaymakam]] --> | leader_name1 = | elevation_m = | area_footnotes = {{Turkey district areas|SOURCE}} | area_blank1_title = District | area_blank1_km2 = {{Turkey district areas|Bilecik|Yenipazar}} | population_footnotes = {{Turkey district populations|SOURCE|Bilecik}} | population_urban = {{Turkey district populations|Bilecik|Yenipazar|şehir}} | population_as_of = {{Turkey district populations|YEAR}} | population_blank1_title = District | population_blank1 = {{Turkey district populations|Bilecik|Yenipazar|toplam}} | population_density_blank1_km2 = auto | postal_code_type = <!-- Post code --> | postal_code = | website = <!-- {{URL|XXXXXXX|XXXXXX}} --> }} '''Yenipazar''', formerly '''Kırka''', is a town and district of [[Bilecik Province]] in the [[Black Sea Region|Karadeniz]] region of [[Turkey]]. The population is 1061 (as of 2010). The mayor is Cengiz Arıkan ([[Justice and Development Party (Turkey)|AKP]]). ==References== {{reflist}} * {{cite web|url=http://www.fallingrain.com/world/TU/11/Yenipazar.html|title=Geographical information on Yenipazar, Turkey|accessdate=2008-10-21|author=Falling Rain Genomics, Inc|language=English}} ==External links== * [http://www.yenipazar.com/ An introductory guide to Yenipazar] {{tr icon}} {{Districts of Turkey|provname=Bilecik|image=Bilecik|sortkey=Yenipazar}} [[Category:Populated places in Bilecik Province]] [[Category:Yenipazar District, Bilecik Province]] [[Category:Districts of Bilecik Province]] {{Bilecik-geo-stub}}
